content: {"message": "Hi Nacho, this is Donna from Arionkoder. I'm reaching out to complete some information we have on file. Could you please confirm your last name for us?", "continue_chat": true}
Yeah, sure, my last name is Orlando.

{"message": "Thank you for confirming that, Nacho Orlando. That's all we needed for now. If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!", "continue_chat": false}
